description: Java class NetworkInitRequest extends Request, responsible for initiating network setup and triggering startup events in the MockZigbeeCore for Zigbee network initialization.

classes.name: NetworkInitRequest
classes.description: Handles network initialization requests, triggers startup events, and sends responses within the mocked Zigbee environment.

methods.name: NetworkInitRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing the request with a given request ID.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the network initialization logic, including sending startup events and responses.
